physical strength

A few years ago, the sports meeting in Seattle, the disabled,air max 95 and participants are all body or intelligence defective child. They were ranked neatly in the meters dash to the starting line.Then the gunfire rang, all of the people are run. They are not exactly in dash, but they are happy to run the finish and win. Suddenly, a boy on the runway fell, cheap air max 95 his strong to climb up, fall, he again and strong to climb up...... No, the boy finally continuous frequently cry. Eight other children to listen to fall boy crying, the full speed to stop. And then turned back to run, not the exception.At this moment, with a "low syndrome" girl could bend, jordan air max in that the boy's face was kiss said: "this will make you feel better."Then, nine children walked arm in arm toward the end.The stadium everyone in the audience stood up and applause and cheers waves surging, saving for about ten minutes

televisions

Now more and more people own televisions? which present a very vivid world to us. On television? we can watch exciting matches?air max 95 see most of the places of interests without going there ourselves. From TV? We learn many things happening in the world.Television also plays an educational role in our daily life. Children enjoy learning much interesting knowledge from TV.cheap air max 95 By providing various TV university courses,television offers various educational programs for different viewers.
However? television can also be harmful. It hurts our eyes. Watching TV too much influences our sleep and work. Now many students spend too much time on TV? which reduces their study time and does great harm to their health. In short?jordan air max we should regard television as our assistant? not our master.

Lucky Numbers

Do “Lucky Numbers” Really Bring Good Luck?
??Some people think certain numbers may bring good luck. jordan sneakers These numbers include “6”? “8”? “9” and so on. Therefore? when they want to choose a car number or a phone number?air Jordan shoes they buy the number which ends with these lucky numbers at a higher price.
??In my opinion?cheap jordan sneakers there are no relations between the so-called lucky numbers and luck. The only key to success on wealth lies in hard work. If we are too dependent on it? we may become lazy or easily discouraged when these numbers proved to be useless. We should believe in our own efforts to struggle for the success.
